body.name: hims everyday moisturizer for men - Energize Skin, Lock in Hydration - Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter, Lightweight Formula, Ocean Scent - Vegan, Cruelty-Free, No Parabens - (1oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 56 mins
features: LIGHTWEIGHT HYDRATION - A simple yet powerful mens face cream that can be used every morning and leaves no oily residue behind. Hyaluronic acid holds 1000 times its weight in water, so skin feels fresh. Shea butter naturally boosts skin's softness

GLOWING SKIN - This non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into skin, without feeling goopy, for a natural healthy glow all day long. Lightly moisturizes skin without looking overly shiny or oily, clogging pores, or feeling heavy and uncomfortable

ALL SKIN TYPES - Safe enough to use daily on sensitive skin, oily skin, dry skin, combination skin, and mature skin. Hyaluronic acid protects skin by preventing water loss. Shea butter gently softens and leaves skin radiant and smooth day or night

OCEAN SCENT - Infused with a subtle ocean scent that is not overpowering. Feel good knowing this men's face moisturizer is cruelty-free, not tested on animals, vegan, paraben-free, phthalate-free, sulfate-free, and gluten-free

HOW TO USE - Gently massage 1 to 2 pumps on chin, cheeks, forehead, and neck with fingertips after washing your face or showering in the morning or in the evening before going to bed. Safe to use every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Chuck Norris of Skincare!
reviews.reviewText: Alright, fellas, let's get one thing straight. This isn't just a moisturizer. This is Hims Everyday Moisturizer for Men. It's like the Chuck Norris of skincare - tough, reliable, and doesn't mess around.From the moment I applied this bad boy, I knew I was in for a treat. It's like my skin had been wandering through a desert, and this moisturizer was the oasis it had been searching for. It's not just hydrating, it's life-giving.The texture? Smoother than a jazz saxophone solo. The scent? Subtle, yet manly - like a lumberjack who also knows his way around a poetry book. And the feeling? It's like my face just won the lottery and decided to retire in the Bahamas.But the best part? It's not greasy. I mean, who wants to walk around looking like they've just wrestled a stick of butter? Not this guy. This moisturizer absorbs faster than a sports car on an open road. It's like it's saying, "Don't worry, bro. I've got you covered."And let's not forget about the packaging. Sleek, minimalist, and undeniably masculine. It's like the moisturizer equivalent of a tailored suit - it just screams class.So, if you're a man who cares about his skin (and let's face it, who isn't these days?), do yourself a favor and get this moisturizer. It's not just a product, it's a statement. It's not just skincare, it's self-care.In short, Hims Everyday Moisturizer for Men is the skincare hero we men didn't know we needed.Five stars? More like a whole action movie franchise!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use to buy an $60 moisturizer for my face and decided to find a more economical alternative. I've tried this for a week now, and in the short time, I've actually seen better results. No oily or filmy type of feeling on my face. I really like this formulas. Makes my face surface feel smooth, moisterized and non-oily the whole day. Great results and I will continue buying this stuff. Has a very light scent that has a fresh aroma but goes away after about 2-3 minutes.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great men's moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I really like this moisturizer. It's light weight and not oily and doesn't cause pimples like I've experienced with other moisturizers. I enjoy the scent of it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Absolute Best Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: First of all, let me tell you what this moisturizer claims to do. According to the product description, it's a lightweight cream that can energize your skin and lock in hydration. It contains hyaluronic acid, which can hold 1000 times its weight in water, and shea butter, which can soften and smooth your skin. It also has a subtle ocean scent that is not overpowering. It's vegan, cruelty-free, paraben-free, phthalate-free, sulfate-free, and gluten-free.Sounds good, right? Well, I can confirm that this moisturizer lives up to its claims. I have combination skin that tends to get dry and flaky in some areas and oily and shiny in others. This moisturizer has helped me balance my skin and keep it hydrated without making it greasy or clogging my pores. It absorbs quickly into my skin and leaves it feeling fresh and comfortable. It also gives me a natural healthy glow that lasts all day long.I love the texture and smell of this moisturizer. It's not too thick or thin, but just right for spreading evenly on my face and neck. It has a pleasant ocean scent that reminds me of the beach and makes me feel relaxed. It's not too strong or artificial, but just enough to make me enjoy using it.The best part is that this moisturizer is very affordable and comes in a convenient pump bottle that dispenses the right amount of product. You only need one or two pumps for your whole face and neck, so it lasts for a long time.Overall, I'm very impressed with the hims everyday moisturizer for men and I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a simple yet effective moisturizer that can suit any skin type. It's one of the best products I've ever tried and I'm definitely going to repurchase it when I run out.
